Pre-Game Insights: Luka Doncic is available to play after being listed as 'questionable' due to a left groin strain.
Doncic has averaged 28.8 points, 8.0 rebounds, and 8.0 assists per game this season.
Doncic has consistently posted impressive numbers against the Nuggets, averaging 27.3 points, 8.3 rebounds, and 9.7 assists per game in past matchups.
